content: skinny headband for travellers free crochet pattern from bandana heads crochet headbands are comfortable hair accessories for travelers when life is lived out of a suitcase a pretty practical headband will add a touch of color and interest to your basic travel wardrobe this free skinny headband pattern features easy to follow instructions that allow you to check your work as you go so you find and fix mistakes immediately usa crochet terminology is used throughout read the stitch definitions provided before you begin you will need a small amount of 4 ply or baby weight cotton yarn and
